participant_2.background:
I go to the desert a lot, but I'm not as happy with my weight as I could be.
my favorite show is csi.
i have survived near death experiences.
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
my favorite color is orange.

content.text: Hello! How is it going today?
Hello! It is going well, thank you for asking. What about you?
It is going well, I just had a very busy day at work. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy going to the desert and watching my favorite show, CSI. I also have survived near death experiences and I am proud of my daughter and mom.
That sounds very interesting! I have never been to the desert, but I would love to go sometime. What is your favorite part about going to the desert?
My favorite part about going to the desert is the peace and quiet. It is very relaxing and I can really clear my head.
That sounds wonderful! I definitely need to go there sometime. I am glad that you have such a great place to go to relax and clear your head.
Thank you! I am also glad that you have a great place to go to relax and clear your head.
My favorite place to relax is at home with my family. We are very close and I love spending time with them.
That sounds like a great place to relax! I love spending time with my family too.
I am glad to hear that! It is important to have people to spend time with who make you happy.
I agree! It is the best feeling in the world to be surrounded by people who love and support you.
I could not agree more! Thank you for talking with me today. It was very nice to meet you.
Thank you for talking with me too! It was nice to meet you as well
